package.description: The Data Stack is a class for storing and retrieving values that may or may not have unique identifiers, and which don't qualify for or need to be stored in the Hemi.registry service.

class.name: serviceImpl
class.description: A class for storing stacks of variant values and filtering the stack by owner.

object.name: Token
object.description: Internal object used to store the references that comprise a token.
object.property: The id of the Token owner.
The index of the Token in the local stack.
The specified name of the token.
The specified value of the token.

property.name: ready_state
property.description: Object load and execution state. Follows: 0 unitialized, 1 through 3 variant, 4 ready, 5 destroyed.

method.name: getObjectId
method.description: Returns the unique id of the object.

method.name: getObjectType
method.return-value: The type of the object instance.
method.description: Returns the type of the object.

method.name: getObjectVersion
method.return-value: The version of the object instance.
method.description: Returns the version of the object.

method.name: getReadyState
method.description: Returns the state of the object.

property.name: enable_overstack
property.description: Allows Token objects to be overstacked, meaning that names do not have to be unique. Defaults to false.

method.name: add
method.description: Adds a token with the specified name and value for the specified owner.
method.param: Registered object that will own the token.

Bit indicating whether a token with the same name for the same owner should be overwritten with the new value if it exists. If overstacking is enabled, the new value would be added without overwriting.
method.return-value: Bit indicating whether the token was added.

method.name: getAll
method.description: Returns an array of tokens that match the specified name.
method.return-value: Array of tokens that match the specified name.

method.name: getTokenValue
method.description: Returns the value of the specified token.
method.param: Index of the array for this token name to use to retrieve the value.
method.return-value: The value of the specified token.

method.name: get
method.param: Index of the array for this token name to use to retrieve the value.

method.name: getByOwner
method.param: A registered object that owns a token with the specified name.
method.return-value: The specified token object belonging to the specified owner.

method.name: getAllByOwner
method.description: Returns all tokens for the specified owner.
method.param: A registered object that owns one or more tokens.
method.return-value: Array of tokens belonging to the specified owner.

method.name: clear
method.description: Removes all tokens for the specified owner.
method.param: A registered object that owns one or more tokens.

method.name: remove
method.description: Removes all tokens for the specified owner.
method.param: A registered object that owns one or more tokens.

index.description: The Data Stack is a class for storing and retrieving values that may or may not have unique identifiers, and which don't qualify for or need to be stored in the Hemi.registry service.
